title: A godly boke wherein is contayned certayne fruitefull, godlye, and necessarye rules, to bee exercised [et] put in practise by all Christes souldiers lyuynge in the campe of this worlde
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536. Enchiridion militis Christiani.
publicationStmtPublisher: By VVyllyam Seres dvvellynge at the vveste ende of Paules Churche, at the sygne of the Hedgehogge],
